title: WaitGate — Browser Heartbeat & Patience Policy
summary: Standardized heartbeat/ping + UI nudge so long-thinking AI sessions don’t trigger browser 'page unresponsive' popups; enforces BPOE heartbeat policy.
rationale: Browsers nag during heavy AI compute; a cross-browser heartbeat plus policy avoids false stalls and preserves focus.
impact: Fewer broken flows, less user anxiety, and cleaner long-run tasks in-browser.
